pages.text: The $(d)White Stone$() has the power to $(3)prevent your death once$() while charged. Doing so fully discharges the item.$(br2)To recharge it, $(3)expose it to the full moon$(). It will gain charge while it's under the night sky while the full moon is at its peak, while either dropped on the ground or in your inventory.
pages.title: White Stone

pages.text: The White Stone can be rarely found in dungeon chests.
